item.title: Compilers 101
item.description: Compilers This article is all about compilers. For many people, a compiler is a mystery. for them, it is like a magical black box that takes the source file as an input and generates a binary file that can be executed. However, the truth to be told, compilers are not wizards. In this article, we will start from the introduction to the front-end of a compiler from a reverse-engineering perspective.
